title: Alison Brie | Geena Davis
description:
Seth welcomes Alison Brie, who talks about her directorial debut on GLOW. Then, Alison takes a few more questions backstage exclusively for the podcast.

After that, Seth talks to Geena Davis about her research into female representation in media, and Geena sticks around to answer some more questions backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
